verses.verse: And Jehovah <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>,
Speak <WH1696> unto the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, and say <WH559> unto them <WH3068>, I am Jehovah your God <WH430>.

After the doings <WH4639> of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, wherein ye dwelt <WH3427>, shall ye not do <WH6213>: and after the doings <WH4639> of the land <WH776> of Canaan <WH3667>, whither I bring <WH935> you <WH6213>, shall ye not do; neither shall ye walk <WH3212> in their statutes <WH2708>.
Mine ordinances <WH4941> shall ye do <WH6213>, and my statutes <WH2708> shall ye keep <WH8104>, to walk <WH3212> therein <WH3068>: I am Jehovah your God <WH430>.
Ye shall therefore keep <WH8104> my statutes <WH2708>, and mine ordinances <WH4941>; which <WH834> if a man <WH120> do <WH6213>, he shall live <WH2425> in them <WH3068>: I am Jehovah.
None of you shall approach <WH7126> to any <WH376> that are near <WH7607> of kin <WH1320> to him <WH1540>, to uncover their nakedness <WH6172>: I am Jehovah <WH3068>.

The nakedness <WH6172> of thy father <WH1>, even the nakedness <WH6172> of thy mother <WH517>, shalt thou not uncover <WH1540>: she is thy mother <WH517>; thou shalt not uncover <WH1540> her nakedness <WH6172>.
The nakedness <WH6172> of thy father <WH1>'s wife <WH802> shalt thou not uncover <WH1540>: it is thy father <WH1>'s nakedness <WH6172>.

The nakedness <WH6172> of thy sister <WH269>, the daughter <WH1323> of thy father <WH1>, or the daughter <WH1323> of thy mother <WH517>, whether born <WH4138> at home <WH1004>, or born <WH4138> abroad <WH2351>, even their nakedness <WH6172> thou shalt not uncover <WH1540>.

The nakedness <WH6172> of thy son <WH1121>'s daughter <WH1323>, or of thy daughter <WH1323>'s daughter <WH1323>, even their nakedness <WH6172> thou shalt not uncover <WH1540>: for theirs <WH2007> is thine own nakedness <WH6172>.

The nakedness <WH6172> of thy father <WH1>'s wife <WH802>'s daughter <WH1323>, begotten <WH4138> of thy father <WH1>, she is thy sister <WH269>, thou shalt not uncover <WH1540> her nakedness <WH6172>.
Thou shalt not uncover <WH1540> the nakedness <WH6172> of thy father <WH1>'s sister <WH269>: she is thy father <WH1>'s near kinswoman <WH7607>.
Thou shalt not uncover <WH1540> the nakedness <WH6172> of thy mother <WH517>'s sister <WH269>: for she is thy mother <WH517>'s near kinswoman <WH7607>.
Thou shalt not uncover <WH1540> the nakedness <WH6172> of thy father <WH1>'s brother <WH251>, thou shalt not approach <WH7126> to his wife <WH802>: she is thine aunt <WH1733>.
Thou shalt not uncover <WH1540> the nakedness <WH6172> of thy daughter-in <WH1121>-law: she is thy son's wife <WH802>; thou shalt not uncover <WH1540> her nakedness <WH6172>.
Thou shalt not uncover <WH1540> the nakedness <WH6172> of thy brother <WH251>'s wife <WH802>: it is thy brother <WH251>'s nakedness <WH6172>.

Thou shalt not uncover <WH1540> the nakedness <WH6172> of a woman <WH802> and her daughter <WH1323>; thou shalt not take <WH3947> her son <WH1121>'s daughter <WH1323>, or her daughter <WH1323>'s daughter <WH1323>, to uncover <WH1540> her nakedness <WH6172>; they are near kinswomen <WH7608>: it is wickedness <WH2154>.
And thou shalt not take <WH3947> a wife <WH802> to her sister <WH269>, to be a rival <WH6887> to her <WH1540>, to uncover her nakedness <WH6172>, besides the other in her life-time <WH2416>.
And thou shalt not approach <WH7126> unto a woman <WH802> to uncover <WH1540> her nakedness <WH6172>, as long as she is impure <WH5079> by her uncleanness <WH2932>.
And thou shalt not <WH5414> lie <WH7903> carnally <WH2233> with thy neighbor <WH5997>'s wife <WH802>, to defile thyself with her <WH2930>.

And thou shalt not <WH5414> give any of thy seed <WH2233> to make them pass <WH5674> through the fire to Molech <WH4432>; neither shalt thou profane <WH2490> the name <WH8034> of thy God <WH430>: I am Jehovah <WH3068>.
Thou shalt not lie <WH7901> with mankind <WH2145>, as with <WH4904> womankind <WH802>: it is abomination <WH8441>.

And thou <WH5414> shalt not lie <WH7903> with any beast <WH929> to defile <WH2930> thyself therewith <WH802>; neither shall any woman stand <WH5975> before <WH6440> a beast <WH929>, to lie down <WH7250> thereto <WH8397>: it is confusion.
Defile <WH2930> not ye yourselves in any of these things <WH428>: for in all these the nations <WH1471> are defiled <WH2930> which I cast out <WH7971> from before you <WH6440>;
And the land <WH776> is defiled <WH2930>: therefore I do visit <WH6485> the iniquity <WH5771> thereof upon it <WH776>, and the land vomiteth out <WH6958> her inhabitants <WH3427>.

Ye therefore shall keep <WH8104> my statutes <WH2708> and mine ordinances <WH4941>, and shall not do <WH6213> any of these abominations <WH8441>; neither the home-born <WH249>, nor the stranger <WH1616> that sojourneth <WH1481> among you <WH8432>;
(for all these <WH411> abominations <WH8441> have the men <WH582> of the land <WH776> done <WH6213>, that were before <WH6440> you <WH776>, and the land is defiled <WH2930>);
that the land <WH776> vomit not you out <WH6958> also <WH2930>, when ye defile it <WH6958>, as it vomited out the nation <WH1471> that was before you <WH6440>.
For whosoever shall do <WH6213> any of these abominations <WH8441>, even the souls <WH5315> that do <WH6213> them shall be cut off <WH3772> from among <WH7130> their people <WH5971>.

Therefore shall ye keep <WH8104> my charge <WH4931>, that ye practise <WH6213> not any of these abominable <WH8441> customs <WH2708>, which were practised <WH6213> before <WH6440> you <WH2930>, and that ye defile not yourselves therein <WH3068>: I am Jehovah your God <WH430>.
